page.title: 10 An Average Day
page.content: In the morning I wake up at 8:00 get dressed,go into the bathroom and have a wash. At 8:25 I have my breakfast and go to school at 8:35.The school bell rings at 8:55.After the teacher has finished taking the register we go into the hall for Assembly at 9:05. At 10:35 we have playtime for 15 minutes.At 12:00 it is lunchtime.We have{Cash Cafeteria.}This means that we can choose what we want before paying for it at the tills.After lunch we go to classes and work until afternoon break which is at 2:20.We all make our way home at 3:45. Then I get changed and play out with my friends.After my dinner,I go out again,and come in again at 8:30.I watch a little television until it is time for bed when I have a wash and clean my teeth.
